author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man was charred to death in a fire accident triggered explosion in a fire-cracker unit here on Saturday.

The victim Thangamani was running a licensed fire cracker unit in Paaparapatty and was managing his unit at the time of the accident. Thangamani was reportedly arranging the crackers, when it lit up triggering explosion.
title: One killed in fire-cracker unit explosion
